snippet.title: Vectronom - Community Update
snippet.description:
MAKE! SHARE! PLAY! Vectronom Community Update is here!

The Community update is live and Vectronom got a brand-new level editor! You can create levels, share them, and play each other’s stuff all within the game. It is really fun to doodle around with the tool and compose beautiful, challenging, and ingenious levels! Download the game from Steam and check out what other people have built or join our community Discord to tell us how we can make this tool even more awesome! Hell, why not do both?

BUILD YOUR OWN RHYTHMIC RIDDLES
Create your own levels share them and play the creations of others. Vectronom features a fully-fledged level editor which will allow you to build mind-bending musical puzzles. Make a level using any of the songs found in the campaign or try out one of the never before heard bonus songs.



VECTRONOM - Available now!
▶︎ Steam : http://vectronom.com/steam
▶︎ Nintendo eShop : http://vectronom.com/eshop
▶︎ AppStore: http://vectronom.com/ios
▶︎ Play Store: http://vectronom.com/android


#indiegames #nintendoswitch #ARTE #musicgames 



Stay in touch
Join the Discord: http://vectronom.com/discord/ 
Web: http://www.vectronom.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ludopium/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ludopium/ 


Concept and development: Ludopium GmbH

Co-produced and published by ARTE France in collaboration with La Compagnie des Martingales and the Franco-German accelerator program Spielfabrique.





Made with love in the beautiful city of Köln - Germany
2020
